name: Spot
trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)

talent.name: Smoke Installation
talent.desc: Heals an ally and then provides percentage Physical Dodge for 3 seconds

skills.desc: +ATK%; Stops attacking and focuses on healing surrounding allies. This Skill modifies the Attack Interval by 1.3

base skill: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process any material, the production rate of byproduct increases by 50%
When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, Precious Metal formula related productivity +30%
